title: ALT-TAB & Focus
author: pgfiore
body_snippet:
Hi there
I've moved to the latest from a way earlier release. Now I'm facing a small bore and I wonder whether win11 21H2 is involved or not.

Said that I'm a strong supporter of keyboard ALT-TAB to move between windows. Since using 1.77.3, the mRemoteNG window brings to the top, but it does not "get the focus". So, I must click onto it before starting typing.

Please, any suggestions are welcome.
pf

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet:
Hi

Do you know what version you came from? Because for me this sounds like a manifestation of one of the already known issues like #1408, #2175, #1650, #208 or #1535 which were already introduced a long time ago...

I feel your pain as it annoys me as well, and I hope this gets fixed soon...
